com.paypal.selion.platform.html

Interface WebPage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPage, BasicPageImpl

    public interface WebPage
    A generic interface for web Page Objects in SeLion.

    Note: "web" is used loosely here. This interface can also be implemented to support mobile applications as is the case with BasicPageImpl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getExpectedPageTitle() 
      WebPage getPage()

      Initialize the page by it's name, page path, and site locale
      boolean isInitialized() 
      boolean isPageValidated()

      void validatePage()

    • Method Detail

      • initPage

        void initPage(String pagePath,
            String pageClassName)
        Initialize the page by it's name and page path
        Parameters:
        pagePath - the path
        pageClassName - the class name

      • initPage

        void initPage(String pagePath,
            String pageClassName,
            String siteLocale)
        Initialize the page by it's name, page path, and site locale
        Parameters:
        pagePath - the path
        pageClassName - the class name
        siteLocale - the locale to use

      • isInitialized

        boolean isInitialized()
        Returns:
        initialization state

      • getExpectedPageTitle

        String getExpectedPageTitle()
        Returns:
        the expected page title for this page

      • getSiteLocale

        String getSiteLocale()
        Returns:
        the current siteLocale setting for this page

      • getPage

        WebPage getPage()
        Returns:
        a WebPage object

      • validatePage

        void validatePage()
        Validates the page against the defined pageValidators defined in the PageYAML for this page.
        Throws:
        PageValidationException - when the page does not validate.

      • isPageValidated

        boolean isPageValidated()
        Returns the outcome of calling validatePage() to validate the loaded page on the WebDriver session.
        Returns:
        true or false, if the page is validated, meaning all pageValidators pass
